original_text: Gideon replied, ‘Because you say that, I will return here. When the Lord has put Zebah and Zalmunna under my power, I will come back to punish you. I will beat you with thorn branches that will tear your skin to pieces!’
korean_text: 기드온이 이르되 그러면 여호와께서 세바와 살문나를 내 손에 넘겨 주신 후에 내가 들가시와 찔레로 너희 살을 찢으리라 하고

sentences.original_text: When the Lord has put Zebah and Zalmunna under my power,
sentences.korean_translation: 주님께서 스바와 살문나를 내 권세에 두셨을 때,

sentences.original_text: I will come back to punish you.
I will beat you with thorn branches
that will tear your skin to pieces!'
